TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICodeGenerator

summary.span: 定义用于生成代码的接口。

span.span: Defines an interface for generating code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中中的代码提供程序包含的实现， ， ，和。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, code providers consist of implementations of , , , and . 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]、 ， ，和方法已过时，和的方法和中直接提供类。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the , , and methods are obsolete, and the methods of and are directly available in the class. 你应在你的代码提供程序实现中重写这些方法，并不调用基方法。You should override those methods in your code provider implementation and not call the base methods. 编译器的开发人员可以实现此接口可使用户可以动态采用特定语言生成代码。Developers of compilers can implement this interface to allow people to dynamically generate code in a particular language. 这可以用于多种用途，如创建生成的代码的向导，创建可调试的内容的动态程序集和具有嵌入代码，例如 ASP.NET 的模板化文档的。This can be used for a variety of purposes, such as creating code-generating wizards, creating dynamic assemblies with content that can be debugged, and for templated documents with embedded code, such as ASP.NET. 实现通常通过调用获取方法。An implementation is typically obtained through a call to the method of .

MemberSignature.Value: public string CreateEscapedIdentifier (string value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string CreateEscapedIdentifier(string value) cil managed
Public Function CreateEscapedIdentifier (value As String) As String
public: System::String ^ CreateEscapedIdentifier(System::String ^ value);

param.name: value
param.span: 要为其创建转义标识符的字符串。

span.span: The string to create an escaped identifier for.

summary.span: 创建指定值的转义标识符。

span.span: Creates an escaped identifier for the specified value.
The escaped identifier for the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 测试是否与保留的标识符冲突或语言关键字和如果是这样，返回一个等效的带有特定于语言的转义码格式设置的名称。 tests whether the identifier conflicts with reserved or language keywords, and if so, returns an equivalent name with language-specific escape code formatting. 这称为转义标识符。This is referred to an escaped identifier. 转义的标识符将包含相同`value`但是会转义代码格式设置添加以使标识符与关键字区分开来。The escaped identifier will contain the same `value` but will have escape code formatting added to differentiate the identifier from the keyword. 两个实现示例是前面`value`使用"@"或包括`value`与"["和"]"。Two implementation examples are preceding the `value` with "@" or bracketing the `value` with "[" and "]".

permission.span: 直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

permission.span: 对继承者的完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分受信任的代码继承。

span.span: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

MemberSignature.Value: public string CreateValidIdentifier (string value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string CreateValidIdentifier(string value) cil managed
Public Function CreateValidIdentifier (value As String) As String
public: System::String ^ CreateValidIdentifier(System::String ^ value);

param.name: value
param.span: 要为其生成有效标识符的字符串。

span.span: The string to generate a valid identifier for.

summary.span: 为指定的值创建有效标识符。

span.span: Creates a valid identifier for the specified value.
A valid identifier for the specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 测试是否与保留的标识符冲突或语言关键字，并返回有效的标识符名称不冲突。 tests whether the identifier conflicts with reserved or language keywords, and returns a valid identifier name that does not conflict. 返回的标识符将包含相同`value`但，如果它与冲突保留或语言关键字，将已转义代码格式添加以使标识符与关键字区分开来。The returned identifier will contain the same `value` but, if it conflicts with reserved or language keywords, will have escape code formatting added to differentiate the identifier from the keyword. 通常情况下，如果此值必须修改，则返回前有一个下划线"_"值。Typically, if the value needs modification, value is returned preceded by an underscore "_".

permission.span: 直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

permission.span: 对继承者的完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

span.span: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsValidIdentifier (string value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsValidIdentifier(string value) cil managed
Public Function IsValidIdentifier (value As String) As Boolean
public: bool IsValidIdentifier(System::String ^ value);

param.name: value
param.span: 用来测试是否为有效标识符的值。

span.span: The value to test for being a valid identifier.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示指定的值是否是当前语言的有效标识符。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified value is a valid identifier for the current language.

returns.span: 如果 参数是有效标识符，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the parameter is a valid identifier; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法测试标识符是否有效。This method tests whether an identifier is valid. 在实现时在派生类中，设计的方法来测试值传递给它，并返回`true`只有值符合语言的规则，并且不与关键字冲突。When implementing in a derived class, design the method to test the value passed to it, and return `true` only if the value fits the rules of the language and does not conflict with a keyword.

Public Function Supports (supports As GeneratorSupport) As Boolean
public: bool Supports(System::CodeDom::Compiler::GeneratorSupport supports);

param.name: supports
param.span: 要为其测试生成器的功能。

span.span: The capabilities to test the generator for.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示该生成器是否支持指定的 对象表示的语言功能。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the generator provides support for the language features represented by the specified object.

returns.span: 如果支持指定的功能，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the specified capabilities are supported; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以调用的数量标志一次以一组的功能测试方法加入一组以及二进制文件的相应功能标志"Or"运算符 (|)。This method can be called with a number of flags at once to test for a set of capabilities by joining a set of appropriate capability flags together with a binary "Or" operator (|).

MemberSignature.Value: public void ValidateIdentifier (string value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ValidateIdentifier(string value) cil managed
Public Sub ValidateIdentifier (value As String)
public: void ValidateIdentifier(System::String ^ value);

span.span: The identifier to validate.

summary.span: 如果指定的值不是一个有效的标识符，将引发异常。

span.span: Throws an exception if the specified value is not a valid identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是返回一个值，如果指定的标识符不是有效的方法实现根据，此方法也会引发异常。Rather than returning a value, this method throws an exception if the specified identifier is not valid according to the method implementation. 例外情况是通常情况下， 。Typically, the exception is an . 此方法可实现的代码生成器，实现此方法来生成一条信息性错误消息根据无效的标识符的值。This method enables a code generator that implements this method to produce an informative error message based upon the value of an invalid identifier.

span.span: The identifier is not valid.

permission.span: 直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分受信任的代码继承。
